message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.DC, cs.SY

This paper discusses the security of smart contracts, which is a topic closely related to computer security (cs.CR) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the use of automated tools for vulnerability detection, which falls under programming languages (cs.PL) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper discusses the categorization and analysis of vulnerabilities, which could be considered a systems and control perspective (cs.SY).
